Curse of Shattered Armor.name: Curse of Shattered Armor
Curse of Shattered Armor.flavor: Tendrils of vegetation suddenly grow from your enemy’s body, wracking it with pain and creating gaps in its armor that you can exploit.
Curse of Shattered Armor.effect: The target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Fey Invocation.name: Fey Invocation
Fey Invocation.flavor: You call upon the luck of the fey lords, but their favor can be as fickle as the cast of a die.
Fey Invocation.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you take damage, roll a d20. On a 10 or higher, you take only half damage. On a 1 or a 2, you take double damage. Otherwise, you take the damage as normal.

Feywild Transformation.name: Feywild Transformation
Feywild Transformation.flavor: The power of the Feywild infuses you, and the planar firmament twists and bends around you. Your foes reel as the threads of reality fray, and your image wavers before their eyes.
Feywild Transformation.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to Reflex and Will, you can teleport up to 3 squares as a move action, and you can use the secondary power once per round.
Feywild Transformation.requirement: The power Feywild Transformation must be active in order to use this power.
Feywild Transformation.onHit: 10 psychic damage, and you are invisible to the target until the end of your next turn.

Curse of the Fiery Soul.name: Curse of the Fiery Soul
Curse of the Fiery Soul.flavor: Heat cascades from your enemy as you cause it to burn from the inside out. As the painful conflagration consumes it, bursts of fire erupt from its body to strike any enemies that get too close to it.
Curse of the Fiery Soul.effect: Until the end of your next turn, any enemy that ends its turn within 2 squares of the target takes 5 fire damage.

Infernal Invocation.name: Infernal Invocation
Infernal Invocation.flavor: The lords of the Nine Hells laugh as they exult in your predicament. They lend you the power you need to survive, but at a steep cost.
Infernal Invocation.effect:
Choose one of the following effects:
* You regain hit points as if you spent two healing surges. You then cannot regain hit points by any other means until the end of the encounter.
* You gain a +10 power bonus to the next saving throw you make during this encounter.
After that saving throw, you take a –2 penalty to saving throws until the end of the
encounter.

Infernal Transformation.name: Infernal Transformation
Infernal Transformation.flavor: With a fiendish roar, you take on the features of a devilish beast, growing long, fiery horns, which you can use with a flick of your head to gore your enemies.
Infernal Transformation.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain both immunity to fire and a +4 power bonus to the damage rolls of melee attacks. In addition, you can use the secondary power once per round.
Infernal Transformation.requirement: The power Infernal Transformation must be active in order to use this power.
Infernal Transformation.onHit: 10 fire damage, and you push the target up to 3 squares.

Chaotic Mind Curse.name: Chaotic Mind Curse
Chaotic Mind Curse.flavor: Swirling multicolored lights attack the mind of your enemy and warp the creature’s perceptions.
Chaotic Mind Curse.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target’s allies provoke opportunity attacks from the target, and it must make every opportunity attack it can.

Elemental Invocation.name: Elemental Invocation
Elemental Invocation.flavor: Chaos power flows from your pact, and its uncontrollable energy might deflect or attract elemental attacks.
Elemental Invocation.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever you take acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage, you can roll a d20. On a 10 or higher, you reduce the damage by 15. On a 1 or a 2, you instead take 10 extra damage of that type.

Curse of Age.name: Curse of Age
Curse of Age.flavor: As your foe succumbs to your attack, its form briefly shows the ravages of age.
Curse of Age.onHit: 2d8 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage, and the target is slowed and weakened until the end of your next turn.

Dark Invocation.name: Dark Invocation
Dark Invocation.flavor: You call on the darkness to cloak you against your enemies’ attacks, but that protection comes at a price.
Dark Invocation.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when any enemy targets you with a melee or a ranged attack, roll a d20. On a 10 or higher, you gain total concealment against that attack. On a 1 or 2, the enemy gains a +10 power bonus to the attack’s damage roll (if any) against you, and you are weakened until the end of your next turn. Otherwise, the attack is resolved as normal.

Shadow Transformation.name: Shadow Transformation
Shadow Transformation.flavor: With a thought, you transform into a creature of pure shadow, drifting like a harbinger of death across the battlefield.
Shadow Transformation.effect:
Until the end of the encounter, you gain the following benefits.
* Aura 2: Bright light in the aura becomes dim light, and dim light becomes darkness.
* Darkvision.
* A fly speed of 3.
* Immunity to disease and fear.
* Insubstantial.
* You can use the secondary power once per round.
Shadow Transformation.requirement: The power Shadow Transformation must be active in order to use this power.
Shadow Transformation.onHit: 5 necrotic damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.

Curse of Forbidden Knowledge.name: Curse of Forbidden Knowledge
Curse of Forbidden Knowledge.flavor: You open your enemy’s mind to the maddening knowledge of unknowable thoughts. Your babbling foe foams at the mouth and lashes out at any of its friends that comes close lest they learn something from its gibberish.
Curse of Forbidden Knowledge.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target must make a melee basic attack as an opportunity action against any enemy of yours that ends its turn adjacent to the target.

Star Invocation.name: Star Invocation
Star Invocation.flavor: Your body dissipates into a whirl of starry lights.
Star Invocation.effect: You become insubstantial and weakened until the end of the encounter or until you dismiss this effect with a minor action.

Starry Transformation.name: Starry Transformation
Starry Transformation.flavor: Like a shining mote of light, you float into the air and shed brilliant light.
Starry Transformation.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you shed bright light in a radius of 30 squares, and you gain fly speed 8 and immunity to radiant damage. In addition, you can use the secondary power once per round.
Starry Transformation.requirement: The power Starry Transformation must be active in order to use this power.
Starry Transformation.onHit: The target is blinded until the end of its next turn.
